attributes.action: Government to offer reduce charge for any diesel cars registered from 09 to 2016
attributes.additional_details: More than 10 million motorists who were “betrayed and misled” into buying diesel cars. Government and local councils now wants to take advantage by charging diesel drivers. Goverment should charge higher road TAX on any diesel cars registered before 2009 car scrappage scheme make in.
attributes.background: Diesel car drivers have been dealt another blow as they face extra charges to park in central London and other local authorities have plans for a diesel surcharge because of concerns over emissions.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
